thread.title: BRIEF-Shanghai Kindly Enterprise Development Group shareholder to cut up to 6 pct stake in co

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Shanghai Kindly Enterprise Development Group shareholder to cut up to 6 pct stake in co

organizations.name: shanghai kindly enterprise development group co ltd

text:
Feb 2(Reuters) - Shanghai Kindly Enterprise Development Group Co Ltd
* Says coâ€™s shareholder, a limited partnership, plans to cut up to 6 percent stake (18.9 million shares) in the co within six months
* Says the shareholder is holding 7.4 percent stake (23.4 million shares) in the co
